agent_utterance: Love the plan. Here’s a simple cue you can set up today: create one daily phone reminder at 3:50 PM titled 5-min mindful check-in. When it rings, spend five minutes: (1) do two minutes of slow breathing, (2) rate your craving 0–10, (3) note what triggered it, (4) decide on one action: have the protein-rich snack (3–4 PM window) or start the 10-minute walk after dinner (or both), and (5) log the check-in quickly in your journal. If you miss the cue, log retroactively tomorrow morning. How to set it up: on iPhone, use the Reminders app to create a daily reminder at 3:50 PM; on Android, use Google Reminders or Calendar to create a daily alert at 3:50 PM. If cravings vary, you can add a second cue around 4:45 PM. This keeps the process low-effort and aligned with your tonight plan.
